item.title: CirArrow: Circular Arrow Tool
item.author: Nathan Petersen
item.description: img.diagram { width: 30em; height: auto; } canvas { border: 1px solid #000; max-width: 100%; margin: 1em auto; display: block; } Use this tool to calculate shape end-points when modeling circular arrows using CAD software. The output of this tool is a simple set of points which define the requested parametrized circular arrows. Therefore, this tool should be useful for nearly every CAD program that supports elementary objects and shapes, such as lines and polygons.
